Class Retriever<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.plugin.ldap.helper.VisitingRetriever<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the results.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupRetriever, UserRetriever
    Deprecated. 
    Use VisitingRetriever and visitor pattern instead.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class Retriever<T>
extends VisitingRetriever<T>
    Abstract class for retrieving entities from LDAP/AD with common functionality.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
